items.q: What types of TVs do you offer?
items.a: We offer a wide range of TVs including LED, OLED, QLED, and Smart TVs from top brands.
Yes, we offer professional installation services for all TVs purchased through our website.

items.a: All TVs come with a manufacturer’s warranty. Extended warranty options are also available at checkout.

items.q: Can I return or exchange my TV?
items.a: Yes, you can return or exchange your TV within 30 days of delivery, provided it is in its original condition.
Shipping typically takes 3-7 business days, depending on your location and the TV model selected.
